channel.description: Recent content in payment systems on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Digital River Logo Digital River is a private company that provides global e-commerce, payments and marketing services. In 2013, Digital River processed more than $30 billion in online transactions. Digital River is headquartered in Minnetonka, Minnesota. Source
You can download theDigital Riverlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Digital River
item.description: Digital River is a private company that provides global e-commerce, payments and marketing services. In 2013, Digital River processed more than $30 billion in online transactions. Digital River is headquartered in Minnetonka, Minnesota. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Braintree Logo Braintree is a company based in Chicago that specializes in mobile and web payment systems for e-commerce companies. Braintree provides clients with a merchant account and a payment gateway. The company was acquired by PayPal on September 26, 2013. Source
You can download theBraintreelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Braintree
item.description: Braintree is a company based in Chicago that specializes in mobile and web payment systems for e-commerce companies. Braintree provides clients with a merchant account and a payment gateway. The company was acquired by PayPal on September 26, 2013. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
PayPoint Logo PayPoint plc is a British business offering a system for paying bills in United Kingdom, Ireland and Romania. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Source
You can download thePayPointlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: PayPoint
item.description: PayPoint plc is a British business offering a system for paying bills in United Kingdom, Ireland and Romania. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange. Source
